_note: System governance thresholds. Version-controlled by design.
_description: WATCHER Agent policy configuration for Chapter 13 Live Feedback Loop
_test_mode_note: Set to true ONLY for synthetic injection testing. Production must be false.

synthetic_injection._enabled_note: Requires BOTH test_mode:true AND enabled:true. Dual-flag safety.
synthetic_injection._true_seed_note: Known seed for convergence validation. System should 'find' this.

retrain_triggers._description: Conditions that trigger Steps 3→5→6 rerun (v1: requires approval)
retrain_triggers._n_draws_note: Minimum draws for statistical significance before retraining
retrain_triggers._drift_note: Retrain if predicted vs actual correlation drops below this
retrain_triggers._misses_note: Retrain after this many zero-hit draws in a row
retrain_triggers._collapse_note: Retrain if hit rate drops below this over collapse_window draws
retrain_triggers._window_note: Number of draws to evaluate for hit rate collapse

regime_shift_triggers._description: Conditions that trigger FULL pipeline rerun (Steps 1→6)
regime_shift_triggers._decay_note: Full rerun if window performance decays beyond this
regime_shift_triggers._churn_note: Full rerun if survivor population changes by this fraction
regime_shift_triggers._llm_note: LLM must have >0.8 confidence to recommend regime shift

acceptance_rules._description: Validation rules for LLM-proposed parameter changes
acceptance_rules._delta_note: Reject proposals that change any parameter by >30%
acceptance_rules._params_note: Reject proposals that change >3 parameters at once
acceptance_rules._cooldown_note: Minimum runs between parameter changes (prevent thrashing)

escalation._rejects_note: Alert human after rejecting 3 consecutive proposals
escalation._divergence_note: Always alert human on detected divergence
escalation._regime_note: v1 requires human approval for full pipeline reruns

v1_approval_required._description: Actions requiring human approval in v1 (autonomous in future)
v1_approval_required._retrain_note: v1 evaluates triggers but requires approval to execute
v1_approval_required._regime_note: Full pipeline reruns always require approval in v1
v1_approval_required._params_note: LLM proposals require approval before application

convergence_targets._description: Expected metrics for functional mimicry validation (NOT seed-finding)
convergence_targets._top100_note: DEPRECATED - functional mimicry measures hit rate, not seed ranking
convergence_targets._top20_note: DEPRECATED - functional mimicry measures hit rate, not seed ranking
convergence_targets._trend_note: Confidence on true seed should trend upward
convergence_targets._hitrate_note: System should achieve >5% hit rate on synthetic data

daemon_settings._poll_note: How often daemon checks for new_draw.flag
daemon_settings._llm_timeout_note: Max time for LLM analysis response
